title: Biggest Risk Of Crypto Is Money Laundering, Terror Financing: Finance Minister - NDTV
content: Biggest Risk Of Crypto Is Money Laundering, Terror Financing: Finance Minister  NDTV
description: Amidst the pioneering fintech revolution, the biggest risk of cryptocurrency could be money laundering and its use for financing terror, said Union Minister of Finance Nirmala Sitharaman on Monday (local time).
